local_intent: Perform the transfer: align to the T-block, set yaw, push 0.2m toward 0°, verify near goal, then retreat and pause.
coherence_with_global: Keeps the detection retries, alignment, yaw=90°, push(target=t_block, distance=0.2, direction=0, timeout=1500), goal verification, retreat and wait consistent with GLOBAL_BT and the transfer phase.
